issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:

1. Download the attached app
2. Point your root path (in your config file or symbolic link) to the mobile web directory (/build/mobileweb)
3. Ensure you are on wifi > appcelerator inc. on both your mac and device
4. Start your local server (i.e. nginx)
5. Using ifconfig or other tool, find out your IPv4 address
6. Enter the ip address in your device's mobile safari browser
7. Press the feature event button
8. To verify the result this step requires read acccess to the appcelerator.analytics.datastore bucket, see myself or Natalie for help if needed

Expected result:
Each of the respective events is sent

Actual result:
The events are not being sent
fields.summary: MobileWeb : Analytics - Feature, nav, settings, timed, and user events are not being sent to the analytics production server
fields.environment:
Tested with Ti Studio build 1.0.9.201202141208
Ti Mob SDK 2.0.0.v20120312213243
OSX Lion 10.7.3
iPhone 4S OS 5.0.1
Mobile Safari browser
